clause.title: Carparking for people with a disability

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: Carparking spaces for use by people with a disability must be—

ol.li: provided, to the degree necessary, to give equitable access for carparking; and

callout.p: D1P8 does not apply to a building where—

ol.li: a parking service is provided; and
direct access to any carparking spaces by the general public or occupants is not available.
